name: FUN SHOOTING RANGE (VR Shooting Game for Oculus Quest )
name_original: FUN SHOOTING RANGE (VR Shooting Game for Oculus Quest )
description:
This is a fun shooting range with many weapons of many types: modern guns, lighting guns, rocket launcher, lighting sabers, katanas, hammers, lighting hammers etc.

There is a free practice mode and a scoring mode, where you need to destroy all targets as fast as possible and beat the fastest record time!

This is the base of many upcoming ultra fun games, that will include these weapons and mechanics, so stay tuned!
